mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into video_list (vtitle, author, cover_url, head_url, comment_num, like_num, collect_num, play_url) values (#{vtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{collectNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{playUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update video_list set vtitle = #{vtitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, author = #{author,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cover_url = #{coverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_url = #{headUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment_num = #{commentNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, like_num = #{likeNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, collect_num = #{collectNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, play_url = #{playUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select vid, vtitle, author, cover_url, head_url, comment_num, like_num, collect_num, play_url from video_list where vid = #{vid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select vid, vtitle, author, cover_url, head_url, comment_num, like_num, collect_num, play_url from video_list
